name: Steve Radich
text: I almost didn't go because of the low rating, food was perfectly fine.. fIrly quick, good service. Probably best place at the food court. it's a 5 for a food court..

name: Stephanie Hardy
text: Had a co worker pick me up a slice when he went on break. This is the most disgusting slice of pizza I have ever had.  It looks like it has sat for days! I am so disappointed! Never again will I waste my money there!

name: Camelia Cruz
text: Todas is the first day goin villa pizza and the girl was there is a rasist girl the i never meet never come back

name: dennis Wark
text: Worse chicken wings I ever had. Dry and hard as a rock.
